Cam::

She nodded and looked around.  She saw another drone and tried 
again.  She crouched down and snuck up on the drone.  She waited 
untill she was right next to it. She then leaned up and leaped. This 
time, she landed right on top of the drone. But she wasn't centered 
and the drone tipped, She was hanging upside down while still keeping 
her claws in the drone. She looked around and whimpered. Then she 
cried "BLACKFANG!"



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Blackfang: Next time, you should try to put more weight on your hind
> legs when you leap. You'll jump a bit farther.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> 
wrote:
> > Cam::
> > She rubbed her head. "That's not now you did it. I hurt my head."
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > However, the hit had destabilized the drone and it went hurling 
at a
> > > nearby tree.
> > > 
> > > Blackfang: Nice going, even though it was a bit awkward...
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > > Cam::
> > > > 
> > > > She nodded and smiled.  She went and looked. Another drone 
was 
> > near 
> > > > by.  She saw it was about 60 yards away. She crouched down, 
just 
> > like 
> > > > Blackfang did.  She crawled up really slowly to the drone. 
She 
> > > > crawled up right under the drone. She went to pounce and 
banged 
> > her 
> > > > head on the underside of the drone and fell the the ground.  
She 
> > > > whimpered a bit and rubbed her head with her 
paw. "Ohhwwwwiieee, 
> > that 
> > > > hurrrtt." with a whine and a whimper.
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> 
wrote:
> > > > > Blackfang saw that the puppy bot was going full frontal at 
the 
> > > > drones.
> > > > > She would get bored soon if she went on like this. He 
> > transformed to
> > > > > wolf mode and met her near a tree.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Blackfang: You're enthusiastic, but you have to be careful 
too. 
> > Let 
> > > > me
> > > > > show you how to do this great, okay?
> > > > > 
> > > > > He squatted his large shape near the ground and advanced 
slowly
> > > > > through the bushed. There was a drones mere meters away. He 
> > moved
> > > > > slowly, silently, until he was just under the drone, on the 
> > other 
> > > > side
> > > > > of a shrub. Then, he jumped. Quick as a bullet, he leapt 
just 
> > over 
> > > > the
> > > > > drones and brought all his weight down on it.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Blackfang: I know you can do just as good. It might take 
time, 
> > but I
> > > > > know you can do it! Now it's your turn.
> > > > >
